title: Ouray, Colorado
summary: The City of Ouray (/ˈjʊəreɪ/) is the home rule municipality that is the county seat of Ouray County, Colorado, United States.[10] The city population was 1,000 as of the 2010 census.[10][11] The Ouray Post Office has the ZIP code 81427. Ouray's climate, natural alpine environment, and scenery has earned it the nickname, "Switzerland of America".[2]
